Verses: 1 karththar sollugiRaar: naan ungaL thaayai anuppivittapOdhu, avaLukkuk koduththa thaLLudhaRcheettu engE? alladhu enakkuk kadankoduththa evanukku ungaLai naan vitruppOttEn? idhO, ungaL akkiramangaLinimiththam neengaL viRkappatteergaL; ungaL paadhagangaLinimiththam ungaL thaai anuppividappattaaL.

2 naan vandhapOdhu oruvanum illaamaRpOnadhenna? naan kooppittapOdhu maRuuththaravu kodukka oruvanum illaamaRpOnadhenna? meetkak koodaadhapadikku en karam kuRugitrOï¿½? viduvikkiRadhaRku ennidaththil belanillaamaRpOyitrO? idhO, en kaNdidhaththinaalE kadalai vatrappaNNi, nadhigaLai vettaantharaiyaakkippOdugiREn; avaigaLiluLLa meen thaNNeerillaamal thaagaththaal seththu naaRugindradhu.
3 naan vaanangaLukkuk kaariruLai uduththi, rattai avaigaLin mooduseelaiyaakkugiREn.

4 iLaippadaindhavanukku samayaththiRkEtra vaarththai solla naan aRiyumpadikku, karththaraagiya aaNdavar enakkuk kalvimaanin naavaith thandharuLinaar; kaalaidhORum ennai ezhuppugiRaar; katrukkoLLugiRavargaLaippOla, naan kEtkumpadi en seviyaik gavanikkachcheygiRaar.
5 karththaraagiya aaNdavar enseviyaith thiRandhaar; naan edhirkkavumillai, naan pinvaangavumillai.
6 adikkiRavargaLukku en mudhugaiyum, thaadaimayiraip pidungugiRavargaLukku en thaadaigaLaiyum oppukkoduththEn; avamaanaththukkum umizhneerukkum en mugaththai maRaikkavillai.
7 karththaraagiya aaNdavar enakkuth thuNaiseygiRaar; aagaiyaal naan vetkappadEn; naan vetkappattuppOvadhillaiyendru aRindhirukkiREn; aadhalaal en mugaththaik kaRpaaRaiyaippOlaakkinEn.
8 ennai needhimaanaakkugiRavar sameebamaayirukkiRaar; ennOdE vazhakkaadugiRavan yaar? Egamaai niRpOmaaga, yaar enakku edhiraaLi? avan ennidaththil varattum.

9 idhO, karththaraagiya aaNdavar enakkuth thuNaiseygiRaar; ennai aakkinaikkuLLaagath theerkkiRavan yaar? idhO, avargaL ellaarum oru vaSthiraththaippOlap pazhasaavaargaL; pottuppoochchi avargaLai arikkum.

10 ungaLil evan karththarukku bayandhu, avarudaiya dhaasanin sollaik kEttu thanakku veLichchamillaadhadhinaal iruttilE nadakkiRaanO, avankarththarudaiya naamaththai nambi, than dhEvanai saarndhukoLLakkadavan.

11 idhO, neruppaik koLuththi, akkinippoRigaLaal soozhappattirukkiRa neengaL anaivarum, ungaL akkini theebaththilum, neengaL moottina akkinijuvaalaiyilum nadavungaL; vEdhanaiyil kidappeergaL; en karaththinaal idhu ungaLukku uNdaagum.
